mapper.insert: insert into building(name, introduction, admin_id) values(#{name}, #{introduction}, #{adminId})
mapper.select: select b.id id, b.name name, b.introduction, d.name adminName, d.id adminId from building b, dormitory_admin d where b.admin_id = d.id
select b.id id, b.name name, b.introduction, d.name adminName, d.id adminId from building b, dormitory_admin d where b.admin_id = d.id and b.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
select b.id id, b.name name, b.introduction, d.name adminName, d.id adminId from building b, dormitory_admin d where b.admin_id = d.id and b.introduction like concat('%', #{introduction}, '%')
